_COMMENT1_: Defines site-specific organization for widget palette
name: widgetPalette_dojo_default

$defaultSections._COMMENT1_: One entry for each section (==folder) in widget palette
$defaultSections.name: Containers
$defaultSections._COMMENT2_: includes provides ordered list of widgets to appear in each section
$defaultSections._COMMENT3_: each entry in array causes a new item to appear in that section
$defaultSections._COMMENT4_: each entry in array can be either a string or an array
$defaultSections._COMMENT5_: if a string, can be either a string that begins with type:, which is a particular widget type
$defaultSections._COMMENT6_: otherwise the string holds a tag, which causes all widgets that match tag to share that item
$defaultSections._COMMENT7_: if an array, then it holds a list of strings, each of which can start with type: (widget type) or a tag

$defaultSections.name: Controls
$defaultSections._COMMENT1_: each section can either have an array of subsections or an array of includes

_COMMENT2_: Should have one each for mobile, desktop, sketchhifi, sketchlofi
_COMMENT3_: For each preset, collections is list of each widget collection in order of precedence
_COMMENT4_: and sections is the array of sections for this preset (or $defaultSections)
